= ProvBench Traces =

These provenance traces were collected from three applications (Apache, BLAST, PostMark) each run on
three operating systems (Linux, Mac OS X, and Windows). The tool(s) used to generate these traces included SPADE with H2 SQL storage.

The provenance traces are provided in compressed SQL script format which can be imported in most SQL databases.

=== Importing into MySQL ===

To import these provenance traces into MySQL, use the following command on Linux/Mac OS X systems replacing `{user}` and `{password}` with your MySQL credentials:

{{{
gzip -dc < script.tar.gz | mysql -u {user} -p {password}
}}}

=== Viewing the H2 SQL database ===

To view or browse the H2 SQL database without importing the SQL script into an existing database, follow the instructions on [DBTools this page].
